description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Cauliflower Couscous recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Couscous,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Cauliflower,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Spiced Cauliflower Couscous Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lemon, juiced and zest finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Place cauliflower florets into a food processor, pulse in short bursts until finely chopped. Set aside.

Heat oil in a nonstick frying pan over medium heat. Add spring onion, garlic and spices and cook for 1 minute, stirring, until fragrant. Add chopped cauliflower and cook for 3 minutes, stirring, until just tender. Season to taste.
Remove from heat and transfer to a bowl. Cool for 10 minutes. Stir through lemon zest and juice. Top with almonds and mint.
